page.title: 17LOW FLYING AIRCRAFT
page.content: In this area we get quite a lot of low flying aircraft on training flights. Sometimes they are as low as thirty metres.The ones that are very low make a terrific noise. The ones that are not too low still make a loud noise. One of the aeroplanes nearly knocked our roof off once. Fighting squadrons sometimes fly overhead in groups. Sometimes they are cargo planes and some are fighters. Some people object to planes flying low but some like it. The fighters fly very fast and they also make the most noise. The cargo planes are just the opposite. They fly slowly and do not make too much noise. The cargo planes are very big too. The planes practise here a lot because it is more out in the country. If they practised in the town or city that would disturb more people.
